com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.wrappers

Class DataWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.wrappers.BasicWrapper<DataWatcherHandle>
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.wrappers.DataWatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DataWatcher
extends BasicWrapper<DataWatcherHandle>
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    This class is a wrapper of the DataWatcher class from CraftBukkit
    It is used to store data and to keep track of changes so they can be synchronized

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DataWatcher.EntityItem<V>
      References the value bound to a DataWatcher Key for a particular Entity
      static class  DataWatcher.Item<V>
      References a single watched item, containing the key, value, and changed state
      static class  DataWatcher.Key<V>
      Wrapper around a raw DataWatcher key object

      • DataWatcher

        public DataWatcher(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entityOwner)

      • DataWatcher

        public DataWatcher()
        Initializes a new Empty DataWatcher. Please avoid binding this constructed DataWatcher to live entities. When doing so, instead use the Entity-accepting constructor.

      • DataWatcher

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public <V> void set(DataWatcher.Key<V> key,
                    V value)
        Write a new value to the watched objects. If the key does not yet exist, the key is added with the default value specified.
        Parameters:
        key - Object key
        value - Value to set to

      • get

        public <V> V get(DataWatcher.Key<V> key)
        Read an object from the watched objects
        Parameters:
        key - Object key
        Returns:
        Object value at the key

        Gets the datawatcher item associated with a certain key
        Parameters:
        key - Object key
        Returns:
        Object item at the key, null if not registered

        public boolean isWatched(DataWatcher.Key<?> key)
        Checks whether a particular key is registered for watching
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if watched, False if not

        public java.util.List<DataWatcher.Item<?>> getWatchedItems(boolean unwatch)
        Get all watched objects
        Parameters:
        unwatch - to unwatch all the items before returning them
        Returns:
        Watched objects

      • isChanged

        public boolean isChanged()
        Gets whether this Data Watcher has changed since the last tick
        Returns:
        True if it had changed, False if not

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Gets whether this Data Watcher is empty or not. An empty Data Watcher does not require any update messages to the players.
        Returns:
        True if empty, False if not

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class BasicWrapper<DataWatcherHandle>

      • clone

        public DataWatcher clone()
        Creates a clone of this DataWatcher with all data entries copied. Changes to the cloned datawatcher do not result in changes in this one.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a clone of this instance
